name: EU Network of Nurse Regulators
goal: The network exists to represent European regulators of nurses. These are all "competent authorities" under the definition of the Qualifications Directive. Our goal is to input into EU policy making by providing our expertise in the recognition of professional qualifications of nurses across the EU.
interests: Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Internal Market, Public Health
euInitiatives:
Freedom of movement
Qualifications Directive 2013/55/EU
Common Training Frameworks
European Professional Card
Alert Mechanism
Reforming Regulated ProfessionsÂ
